p: The reference standard of liquiritin (≥98%), liquiritigenin (≥98%), and isoliquiritin (≥98%) was purchased from Chengdu coming DE biological technology co., LTD (Sichuan, China). The internal standard dichloromethane (≥99%) was purchased from Sinopharm Group Chemical Reagent Co., Ltd. (Shanghai, China). DMSO-d 6 (>99.8%) was purchased from Cambridge Isotope Laboratories, Inc. Other chemicals used in this work were of analytical grade.
